scripts.setup: npm run test-download && npm run extract-download && npm run replace-cert
scripts.extract-download: npm run extract-download-android && npm run extract-download-ios
scripts.extract-download-android: cd download && unzip MyScript_ATK-android-1.3.0.zip && mv MyScript_ATK-android-1.3.0 myscript-android
scripts.extract-download-ios: cd download && unzip MyScript_ATK-ios-1.3.0.zip && mv MyScript_ATK-ios-1.3.0 myscript-ios
scripts.replace-cert: npm run replace-cert-android && npm run replace-cert-ios
